description:
An encounter with a book-like alien lures Dandy to the great library planet with the promise of endless free food and booze, but the journey is interrupted by a space ambush!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je ne me souviendrai jamais de toi, baby
Omae o Never Omoidasenai Jan yo
お前をネバー思い出せないじゃんよ
